objects.text:
• Durable handbag with ample storage
• Premium faux leather material
• Perfect medium size for everyday use

product_details.description: ALDO womens Durable handbag This spaciously stylish tote bag boasts ample storage space and shoulder strap for extra utility Made of synthetic materials 1 compartment: stylish and functional to store your cell phone, wallet, or any other essential you need near by Medium: the perfect medium sized handbag for everyday life Size: 10.9'' L x 4'' W x 12.4'' H (28cm x 10.5cm x 32cm) Fabric type - Faux Leather ** Origin - Imported ** Closure type - Zipper ** Lining - Synthetic ** Country of Origin - Cambodia **

banner_details:
This banner design showcases a high-end women's tote bag with an elegant, soft-tone aesthetic suitable for fashion and lifestyle promotions. The layout is split vertically, with the left panel containing all textual elements over a lightly accented beige background. The title section ("heading") is prominently positioned at the top left with bold, modern typography. Below it, the subheading ("subheading") provides the product brand and model. A bullet-point list ("description") highlights key features like durability and material quality. The price ("price") is emphasized in large, bold characters, followed by a standout call-to-action button ("cta") on a contrasting dark brown rectangular background ("cta_background"). The right side features a large product image ("product_image"), centrally aligned to balance the composition. Background graphics include soft gradient colors and translucent circular accents for visual interest.

**Color Palette:**
- Soft Cream: `#F5EFE6`
- Warm Beige: `#E4D4C8`
- Rich Brown: `#8B5A2B`
- Muted Tan: `#D0A87F`
- Coffee Brown: `#614027`
- Light Taupe: `#B78F65`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image showcases a sophisticated handbag in a warm camel brown color (#A67C52), evoking an elegant and timeless appeal. The textured leather enhances its premium look, while polished gold accents (#D4AF37) on the chains, hardware, and logo bring a luxurious contrast. These metallic highlights are strategically placed to catch light and draw attention without clashing with the overall muted tone. The harmonious blending of earthy brown and shimmering gold creates a refined balance, ideal for banner ads targeting upscale audiences. For added freshness, a soft cream (#F5F5DC) or off-white backdrop can amplify the bag’s richness without overpowering it.
